actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to Congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authority of the President, the Secretary of the Interior, and other Government agencies (formerly subject to congressional veto) to develop land use plans for public lands, sell specified public lands, and withdraw specified public lands, unless the exercise of such authority is approved by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to Congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.
